# Results

## Descriptive Statistics

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE,  results='asis'}
if (!require("stargazer")) install.packages("stargazer")
if (!require("dplyr")) install.packages("dplyr")

library(stargazer)
library(dplyr)

DB_Roa<-data.frame(read.csv2("Analysis/DataBase/DataBase_010418.csv", sep = ";",stringsAsFactors=FALSE, header = TRUE ))

StatDes <- stargazer(DB_Roa, type = "latex", title = "Statistic Descriptive", label = "StatDes", header = FALSE)
```
##Some boxplots

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.align = 'center', fig.width = 6, fig.height = 6}

boxplot(DB_Roa$TobinsQ,horizontal=T,main="Boxplot TobinsQ")
boxplot(DB_Roa$ROA,horizontal=T,main="Boxplot ROA")
boxplot(DB_Roa$Leverage,horizontal=T,main="Boxplot Leverage")
boxplot(DB_Roa$NetMargin,horizontal=T,main="Boxplot NetMargin")
boxplot(DB_Roa$FirmSize,horizontal=T,main="Boxplot FirmSize")
```
